### GrpcMethodList

 
A list of gRPC methods which can be used as an allowlist, for example.

```yaml
"services": []solo.io.envoy.api.v2.core.GrpcMethodList.Service

```

| Field | Type | Description |
| ----- | ---- | ----------- | 
| `services` | [[]solo.io.envoy.api.v2.core.GrpcMethodList.Service](../grpc_method_list.proto.sk/#service) |  |




---
### Service



```yaml
"name": string
"methodNames": []string

```

| Field | Type | Description |
| ----- | ---- | ----------- | 
| `name` | `string` | The name of the gRPC service. |
| `methodNames` | `[]string` | The names of the gRPC methods in this service. |
